title: ConfBoard (edu.ncsu.confboard)
description: ConfBoard in a custom profile by Everette_Allen@ncsu.edu. Setting for the ConfBoard digital display software. See https://http://go.ncsu.edu/confboard

baseURL.title: Base URL
baseURL.description: The base URL to the folder containing the images.txt file or JSON information. Do NOT include trailing backslash.

shouldUseJSON.title: Should Use JSON
shouldUseJSON.description: Base URL is a JSON file or feed not text list of URIs.

shouldDisplayName.title: Should Display Name
shouldDisplayName.description: Show name of device on screen.

groupLabel.title: Group Label
groupLabel.description: String to be added after the baseURL.  Using images.txt this adds after the baseURL and before images.txt.  Using JSON this adds after the baseURL. Can be used to specify a folder on web server with different images.txt or as ? parameter string for JSON feed.

reloadContentTimer.title: Reload Content Timer
reloadContentTimer.description: Time between reloading the list of image links.

rotateImageTimer.title: Rotate Image Timer
rotateImageTimer.description: Username associated with the device in Jamf Pro (computer-level profiles)
